articles.author: AP
articles.title: EU leaders mull ways to get more arms to outgunned Ukraine amid a new sense of urgency - Hindustan Times
articles.description: European Union leaders are debating the escalated arms and ammunition production for Ukraine amid the continued war with Russia. | World News
articles.content:
European Union leaders on Thursday debated fresh ways to help boost arms and ammunition production for Ukraine amid a new sense of urgency about the future of the war-torn country.
